text: If anyone wants to see an demo of the the exhibit in VR come to the experience lab, I took the model felix made and added some graphics skinning to it, and put it into VR it looks amazing. you can walk around the space and see what that area really looks like. its pretty amazing
that’s so awesome!! not in office today but i’ll definitely come check it out tomorrow if the demo is still up and running
sure, ill have it here tomorrow too

its really impressive to see in VR you can see the space just as it really is. Im blown away by how it really feels like the space, having been there a few times i can say this is exactly what the space looks like
aside from the glass glare and reflection, that is missing but the physical dimensions and such are all here
cool! Will stop by after meetings are done
and this lets you walk around a little bit in reality, you can duck down and look from all angles its really neat
OMG - great idea. Could we add that to stuff our open house showcase?
Is it short term, or would we be able to share our work this way indefinitely?
Hoping for long term. It's a great way to showcase our work. <@U0EL0GLEL> best idea ever!

I'm going to make a cardboard version that could be more easily shared not as good as this one. But more accessible. Ill have the setup tomorrow if anyone wants to see it then. Can make a browser based version also. Not as cool but still a nice walkthrough
